mil.emp3.api.utils

Class EmpStyles

  • java.lang.Object
    • mil.emp3.api.utils.EmpStyles

  • public class EmpStyles
extends java.lang.Object
    Underlying CMAPI supports multiple style objects that controle the appearance of the features rendered on the map, GeoStrokeStyle GeoFillStyle GeiLabelStyle EmpStyles is a utility class that provided convenience methods for building these objects and providing a String representation of their members.
